blogPost.excerpt: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. ⠀ Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.

localize.description: 利用Zoom业界领先的视频优先通信平台的性能、规模和可靠性，加速您的开发和构建完全可定制的基于视频的应用。⠀每月可免费使用10,000分钟会话。

next.excerpt: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
next.title: Showwcase - A social network for developers that lets you make money

localize.description: Showwcase是一个为开发者构建和优化的社交网络。开发者可以连接， 与志同道合的人分享他们的知识和展示他们的项目。对于开发者内容创造者来说，你可以通过付费用户赚钱。
localize.tagline: 一个让你赚钱的开发者社交网络。

localize.description: Showwcase是一個爲開發者構建和優化的社交網絡。開發者可以連接， 與志同道合的人分享他們的知識和展示他們的項目。對於開發者內容創造者來說，你可以通過付費用戶賺錢。
localize.tagline: 一個讓你賺錢的開發者社交網絡。
